result.text: SWAP is off on the selected machines.

targets.expr: (node_filesystem_size_bytes{job=~"(.*)-node-exporter", instance=~"$cluster:proxmox:$host:$vm", mountpoint="/"} - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job=~"(.*)-node-exporter", instance=~"$cluster:proxmox:$host:$vm", mountpoint="/"}) / node_filesystem_size_bytes{job=~"(.*)-node-exporter", instance=~"$cluster:proxmox:$host:$vm", mountpoint="/"} * 100

result.text: SWAP is off on the selected machines.

targets.expr: avg(((node_memory_SwapTotal_bytes{job=~"(.*)-node-exporter", instance=~"$cluster:$group:$host:$vm", instance!~"$cluster:proxmox:$host:$vm"} - node_memory_SwapFree_bytes{job=~"(.*)-node-exporter", instance=~"$cluster:$group:$host:$vm", instance!~"$cluster:proxmox:$host:$vm"}) / (node_memory_SwapTotal_bytes{job=~"(.*)-node-exporter", instance=~"$cluster:$group:$host:$vm", instance!~"$cluster:proxmox:$host:$vm"})) * 100 > 0)
